.. _onsite-drs4-baseline:

Onsite Computation of DRS4 Pedestal Coefficients
================================================

Wrapper for the `~lstcam_calib.tools.create_drs4_pedestal_file` tool.

.. argparse::
  :module: lstcam_calib.onsite.onsite_create_drs4_pedestal_file
  :func: parser
